Name:: Last year we increased the housing allowance for students residing off-campus due tothe pandemic. This year our off-campus housing budget moved back to our traditionalmodel, which is less than on-campus housing. That said, our off-campus housingbudget is approximately $3,000 higher than in 2019-2020.
